title: All-new Polygon Mt. Bromo eMTB throws big travel through 6-bar linkage suspension
content:
Polygon’s first-ever full-suspension e-mountain bike takes a new approach to their linkage to deliver 160mm of rear wheel travel with 29er wheels and a really short chainstay. Combine that with modern geometry, a choice of Shimano EP8 or EP7 motors, and a big battery to make a big bike for big days. With their analog […]
